title: So how long is it going to take Riot to figure out Runes Reforged was a failure, and scrap the idea?
body:
Eternity. Because Riot doesn't have the balls to admit when they are wrong.

All I can say is cross your fingers and pray season 9 will be playable. Cause if you play anything off meta at the moment as jungle.. you can't even clear. Every team is 4AD's and you can't even counter it with armor pages. Tanks pop like grapes.

Shit patch.

^ This

Sadly, Rito has a long and toxic history of refusing to admit their own failures, even when the entire community tells them they failed.  Despite all of the propaganda that Rito wouldn't "hesitate" to fully revert something if it proved worse than before, I can only think of 5.22 Kog as the only instance of this ever happening.  Meanwhile, I could list literally dozens of changes, especially reworks that demand reverts, but Rito is far too arrogant to follow through on their empty promises.

**#RIPSonaPatch413**  [#RevertPatch413](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/UivRyHor-its-time-to-revert-patch-413)
Why exactly do you think its a failure? I like it so far.

the XP system for level 100 and taking our ability to get a reasonable amount of in game currency  is a failure. they really had bad timing especially with the new runes and the need for A LOT more pages.
This was my fav patch since 6.21 .. everything after that patch was less than ideal to me.
I actually really like the new runes
